title: How to Cook a Western Omelet

steps.headline: Beat eggs in a medium sized bowl, adding milk in gradually
Put a skillet over medium heat and melt butter
Pour the eggs from the bowl into the skillet
Tilt the pan or use a spoon to move the eggs around pan, cooking them evenly
Continue cooking until eggs are almost firm in the center
Sprinkle cheese, ham, onion, green peppers, and tomatoes on top of half the egg in the skillet and then fold the other side over on top of the cheese, ham, onion...etc.
Continue cooking for 1-2 minutes or until the egg is firm and cheese is melted.
Put the omelet on a plate and pour some salsa on top.

text: Beat eggs in a medium sized bowl, adding milk in gradually  Put a skillet over medium heat and melt butter  Pour the eggs from the bowl into the skillet  Tilt the pan or use a spoon to move the eggs around pan, cooking them evenly  Continue cooking until eggs are almost firm in the center  Sprinkle cheese, ham, onion, green peppers, and tomatoes on top of half the egg in the skillet and then fold the other side over on top of the cheese, ham, onion...etc.  Continue cooking for 1-2 minutes or until the egg is firm and cheese is melted.  Put the omelet on a plate and pour some salsa on top.  Finished.
